description: Create project structure per implementation plan: create `src/`, `src/agents/`, `src/models/`, `src/api/`, `src/jobs/`, `src/utils/`, `src/xlsx/`, `static/`, `tests/`, `licenses/`, `docs/` (path: repository root)
Initialize Python virtual environment and `requirements.txt` (path: repository root) — include `flask`, `openpyxl`, `requests`, `pytest`
Add `.gitignore` and `README.md` with project overview (paths: `.gitignore`, `README.md`)
Create minimal Flask app scaffold `src/api/app.py` implementing app factory and basic routing
Add single-page dashboard scaffold `static/index.html`, `static/css/styles.css`, `static/js/app.js`

Create agent stubs directory and placeholder files: `src/agents/__init__.py`, `src/agents/life_expectancy_agent.py`, `src/agents/worklife_expectancy_agent.py`, `src/agents/wage_growth_agent.py`, `src/agents/discount_rate_agent.py`, `src/agents/present_value_agent.py` (each must implement `run(input_json: dict) -> dict` contract)
Implement aggregator stub `src/aggregator.py` that accepts AgentResult objects and produces `FinalWorkbook` JSON
Implement XLSX generator stub `src/xlsx/xlsx_generator.py` that consumes `FinalWorkbook` and writes an XLSX to a temp path using `openpyxl`
Add temporary storage utility `src/utils/temp_storage.py` for job temp directories and cleanup policy
Implement HTTP API wrappers `src/utils/external_apis.py` with timeouts and retries for BLS/SSA/Fed calls
Implement provenance helper `src/utils/provenance.py` to normalize provenance_log entries and serialize to JSON
Add `licenses/` folder and include license text files for `openpyxl` and `requests` (paths: `licenses/openpyxl_LICENSE.txt`, `licenses/requests_LICENSE.txt`)
Configure testing harness: `pytest.ini`, `tests/__init__.py`, and CI-friendly test layout
Create Intake model `src/models/intake.py` with validation rules per `data-model.md`
Implement POST endpoint `src/api/generate.py` that accepts Intake JSON and returns `{ job_id, status_url }`
Implement in-memory job manager `src/jobs/manager.py` to queue jobs, track status, and manage temp job folders
[US1] Implement `src/agents/life_expectancy_agent.py` (single-file, <=300 lines) — produce `expected_remaining_years_by_age` and provenance_log
[US1] Implement `src/agents/worklife_expectancy_agent.py` (single-file, <=300 lines) — produce `worklife_years` and provenance_log
[US1] Implement `src/agents/wage_growth_agent.py` (single-file, <=300 lines) — produce `growth_rate_series` and provenance_log
[US1] Implement `src/agents/discount_rate_agent.py` (single-file, <=300 lines) — produce `recommended_discount_curve` and provenance_log
[US1] Implement `src/agents/present_value_agent.py` (single-file, <=300 lines) — compute `yearly_cashflows` and `pv_table` and provide provenance_log
Implement `src/aggregator.py` to assemble AgentResults into `FinalWorkbook` JSON (path: `src/aggregator.py`)
Implement `src/xlsx/xlsx_generator.py` to generate the XLSX workbook and include validation against the canonical template (path: `src/xlsx/xlsx_generator.py`)
Add integration test `tests/integration/test_generate_xlsx.py` that runs through `POST /api/generate` → status → download and validates workbook sheets and key labels
Add sample input file `specs/1-wrongful-death-econ/samples/sample_intake.json` for integration tests
Update `static/index.html` dashboard form to match assignment requirements:
Update `src/models/intake.py` validation to match new field requirements:
Add California counties data file `data/california_counties.json` with all 58 county names
Add SOC occupation codes data file `data/soc_occupations.json` with standard occupation codes and titles
Update `static/js/app.js` to handle:
Update `static/css/styles.css` to match assignment UI styling (green header, clean form layout)
Download/obtain Skoog Tables data from "Markov Model of Labor Force Activity 2012-17" (Journal of Forensic Economics 28(1-2), 2019):
Download/obtain CDC Life Tables from National Vital Statistics Reports:
Create data loading utility `src/utils/data_loader.py`:
Add data source documentation `data/README.md`:
Implement Federal Reserve H.15 live data fetching in `src/utils/external_apis.py`:
Add California Labor Market Info client to `src/utils/external_apis.py`:
Add API integration tests `tests/integration/test_live_apis.py`:
Update `.env.example` with API configuration:
Implement Federal Reserve Rate Agent `src/agents/fed_rate_agent.py`:
Implement Skoog Table Agent `src/agents/skoog_table_agent.py`:
Update `src/agents/discount_rate_agent.py` to call Federal Reserve Rate Agent:
Update `src/agents/worklife_expectancy_agent.py` to call Skoog Table Agent:
Implement Supervisor Agent `src/agents/supervisor_agent.py`:
Update `src/jobs/manager.py` to use Supervisor Agent:
Add real-time progress tracking in Supervisor Agent:
Add Supervisor Agent tests `tests/unit/test_supervisor_agent.py`: ⏳ TODO
Update API endpoint `src/api/status.py` to return detailed agent progress:
Update `static/index.html` with new progress dashboard UI:
Update `static/js/app.js` for 3-second polling with detailed updates:
Update `static/css/styles.css` for progress dashboard styling:
Add progress dashboard integration test `tests/integration/test_progress_dashboard.py`: ⏳ TODO
Update `src/xlsx/xlsx_generator.py` to match assignment template:
Add Excel template validation utility `src/xlsx/template_validator.py`:
Create reference template Excel file `docs/examples/assignment_template.xlsx`:
Add Excel output verification test `tests/integration/test_excel_output_format.py`:
Implement standardized `provenance_log` capture across agents in `src/utils/provenance.py` and refactor agents to use it
Populate `Data Sources` worksheet from `FinalWorkbook.data_sources` inside `src/xlsx/xlsx_generator.py`
Create reviewer checklist and sample verified workbook `docs/examples/verified_sample_workbook.xlsx` and `docs/reviewer_checklist.md`
Add integration test `tests/integration/test_provenance_sheet.py` verifying provenance entries map to final totals
Implement parameter override endpoint `src/api/override.py` or extend `POST /api/generate` to accept overrides and reference previous jobs
Implement workbook versioning metadata in `src/jobs/manager.py` and in `FinalWorkbook.version_metadata`
Add frontend override UI `static/js/overrides.js` and UI controls in `static/index.html`
Add integration test `tests/integration/test_override_scenario.py` that runs an initial job, then an override job, and validates versioning and provenance
Configure formatting and linting: add `pyproject.toml` or `setup.cfg` with Black and Flake8 settings (path: repository root)
Add dependency license & security review task: include `licenses/` entries and `docs/dependency_justification.md`
Add CI workflow `/.github/workflows/ci.yml` to run tests and style checks
Write developer docs `docs/developer.md` and update `specs/1-wrongful-death-econ/quickstart.md` with any changes

Run constitution compliance audit: verify each agent file is single-file and <=300 lines and that provenance is produced (task owner: reviewer) — report path: `specs/1-wrongful-death-econ/constituion-audit.md`
